name: Shooting 4 Freedom
description:
Theme: I want to be free

Diversifiers: Endless cycle, Music and action, Hit the box!

Categorie: #PC

Name and skills:

Christian Rojas Blum - Programming - Cochabamba/Bolivia
Paolo Adrian Revollo Gómez - Music - Cochabamba/Bolivia
Milena Vanessa Ramírez López - 3D Art - Cochabamba/Bolivia
Ernesto Javier Rojas Blum - Programming - Cochabamba/Bolivia

Software List

Unity

Blender

Magica Voxel

Fl Studio

Cubase

Gimp

JetBrains Rider

City / Country

Cochabamba Bolivia

Description

A group of revolutionaries tries to get rid of the control of the alien dictators who long ago came to impose their new order.

Survive waves of enemies until you finally manage to stop the threat

Controls

  • WASD To move
  • ARROWS To shoo
    Joystick compatible for local multyplayer (up to 4 players)
  • Left Stick To Move
  • Right Stick To shoot

Thanks for playing! :D
